content:encoded:
Case Closed begins with The Calcutta Truck Caper, from The Adventures Of Sam Spade this week. That story aired June 8, 1947.

(25:15) The Adventures Of Philip Marlowe closes out this week’s episode with his story from February 28, 1950, The Big Step.

Download CaseClosed733

Case Closed is made possible by your support. If you’d like to help out, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you!
